title: Project Manager IT Infrastructure (m/f/d)
description: Currently our client is urgently looking for an IT infrastructure expert who is familiar with analysis and optimization of existing IT infrastructures regarding network, server, cloud, security. Azure experience + monitoring tool knowledge is desired. Workload: 50-60% Location: Dresden + 50% remote Your tasks: Technical evaluation of the existing IT infrastructure (network, server, cloud, security) Derivation and implementation of short-term measures ("quick wins") Creation of a strategic IT roadmap...
